ui_no_compatible_content: There's no compatible content in the clipboard.
ui_play_enter_animation_desc: Enable playing the enter animation for this scenario?
ui_animation_clip_desc: The specific animation clip to play
ui_bone_desc: The target bone the prop will be attached to
ui_error_fetching_jobs: Can't fetch community made jobs. Contact support if the problem persists.
ui_community_jobs_tooltip: You can share your jobs by clicking the 3 dots inside the "Jobs" section.
ui_community_jobs_description: Jobs made by other users of our jobs creator.
ui_job_already_exists: A job with this name already exists.
ui_job_items_description: The items used inside this job. This has been generated by AI, feel free to reach out if there any apparent issues.
ui_please_enter_valid_code: Please enter a valid import code.
ui_import_by_code_description: Enter the job's import code below. You can find a job's code on our website or import jobs directly from the list of available jobs.
ui_remove_after_use_description: If checked, the item will be removed after the action is performed.
ui_player_actions_description: You can configure the actions players can perform on other players here.
ui_tackle_description: Allow tackling players to the ground
ui_vehicle_actions_description: You can configure the actions players can perform on vehicles here.
ui_take_out_of_vehicle_description: Take handcuffed players out of vehicles
ui_delete_alarm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this alarm?
ui_interaction_label_description: The interaction label for this point.
ui_icon_description: The Font Awesome icon for this point.
ui_radius_description: The interaction radius for this point.
ui_global_alarm: Can all players trigger this alarm?
ui_delete_animation_zone_description: Are you sure you want to delete this animation zone?
ui_stop_text_description: The text displayed to stop the animation.
ui_progress_text_description: The text displayed during the animation.
ui_notify_text_description: The text displayed after the animation completes.
ui_check_occupied_description: Check if the animation zone is occupied before allowing interaction.
ui_move_description: Whether the player should be moved to the position at the start of the animation.
ui_back_description: Whether the player should be moved back to the original position after the animation.
ui_disable_freeze_description: Disable freezing the player during the animation.
ui_global_animation_zone: Make this animation zone global. This means that all players can interact with it, not just the one who triggered it.
ui_delete_blip_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this blip?
ui_blip_name_description: The name of the blip on the map.
ui_sprite_description: The sprite ID for the blip icon.
ui_size_description: The size of the blip on the map.
ui_color_description: The color ID for the blip.
ui_global_blip: Is this blip visible to all players?
ui_delete_boss_menu_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this boss menu?
ui_delete_cloakroom_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this cloakroom?
ui_delete_collecting_point_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this collecting point?
ui_required_item_description: The item required to interact with this point.
ui_max_collectable_description: The maximum number of items that can be collected.
ui_duration_description: The duration of the collecting process in milliseconds.
ui_recovery_time_description: The time in milliseconds for the collecting point to recover.
ui_delete_crafting_point_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this crafting point?
ui_required_items_description: The items that will be removed from your inventory.
ui_give_items_description: The items that will be added to your inventory.
ui_delete_garage_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this garage?
ui_label_garage_description: The label seen inside the garage menu.
ui_vehicle_type_description: The type of vehicles stored in this garage.
ui_save_radius_description: The radius in which vehicles are saved to this garage.
ui_shared_garage_description: Do you want the vehicles to be shared between the employees?
ui_job_name_description: This name can no longer be changed. Duplicate the job instead.
ui_job_label_description: The display name of the job.
ui_job_type_description: The type of job (only for QBCore).
ui_default_duty_description: Whether the player is on duty by default (only for QBCore).
ui_off_duty_pay_description: Whether the player gets paid while off duty (only for QBCore).
ui_whitelisted_description: Whether the job is whitelisted (only for ESX).
ui_can_wash_description: Whether the job can wash money (only for esx_society).
ui_job_webhook_description: The webhook that will receive notifications from this job.
ui_grade_label_description: The name of the grade within the job hierarchy.
ui_salary_description: The salary associated with this grade.
ui_boss_actions_access_description: Allow this grade to perform boss actions.
ui_delete_music_player_description: Are you sure you want to delete this music player?
ui_sound_distance_description: The distance at which the sound of the music player can be heard.
ui_delete_register_description: Are you sure you want to delete this register?
ui_employee_percentage_description: The percentage of the sale that goes to the employee.
ui_delete_selling_point_description: Are you sure you want to delete this selling point?
ui_progress_text_selling: The text displayed during the selling process.
ui_delete_shop_description: Are you sure you want to delete this shop?
ui_delete_spawner_zone_description: Are you sure you want to delete this spawner zone?
ui_interaction_offset_description: The offset of the interaction point for the spawned props.
ui_slots_description: The number of available slots in the stash.
ui_delete_stash_description: Are you sure you want to delete this stash?
ui_stash_name_description: Specify a name for this stash or it'll be autogenerated.
ui_max_weight_description: The maximum weight capacity of the stash.
ui_shared_stash_description: Is this stash shared among all players or does each player have their own stash?
ui_global_stash_description: Is this stash visible to all players?
ui_delete_teleport_description: Are you sure you want to delete this teleport?
ui_routing_bucket_description: The routing bucket (also known as dimension) for this teleport.
ui_disable_animation_description: Disable playing the animation for this teleport?
ui_from_label_description: The label for the 'from' teleport point.
ui_from_icon_description: The Font Awesome icon for the 'from' teleport point.
ui_to_label_description: The label for the 'to' teleport point.
ui_to_icon_description: The Font Awesome icon for the 'to' teleport point.
ui_history_description: You can see the history of all the changes made through the jobs creator here.
ui_job_name_explain: This is the unique identifier for the job.
ui_share_job_description:
This will share the job with other users of our jobs creator.
We really appreciate your contribution to the community!
ui_settings_description:
Most of the stuff you would normally find in config.lua is here.
Can't find something? Take a look throught the editable files, framework related stuff needs to be changed there.
ui_interact_distance_description: Maximum distance for player and vehicle interactions
ui_tackle_radius_description: The maximum distance for tackling players
ui_handcuff_items_description: Configure handcuff items and their names
ui_handcuffs_skill_check_description: Enable skill check when handcuffing players
ui_global_player_actions_description: Player actions here will be available for every player regardless of their job.
ui_global_vehicle_actions_description: Vehicle actions here will be available for every player regardless of their job.
ui_action_durations_description: Configure the duration of action progressbars in milliseconds.
ui_webhook_configuration_description: Configure global webhook for your server.
ui_global_webhook_description: The global webhook for all notifications.
ui_job_webhooks_description: Job-specific webhooks can be edited directly in the job configuration.
ui_logging_configuration_description: Configure which events should be logged.
ui_grades_description: Freely edit your job grades and they will be automatically synced inside your framework.
ui_create_jobs_description: Create jobs in the jobs tab.
ui_popular_jobs_description: The most played jobs on your server, sorted by popularity.
ui_progress_duration_description: The duration of the progressbar in milliseconds.
ui_delete_grade_description: Are you sure you want to delete this grade?
ui_delete_job_description: Are you sure you want to delete this job?
ui_no_results_description: There's no data matching your search query.
ui_no_data_to_display_description: It looks like there's no data available yet. Try adding some new items.
ui_error_duration_or_stop: Either 'duration' or 'stop' must be provided, but not both.
ui_error_name_invalid: Only letters, numbers and underscores are allowed.
